game.name: Rocket Penguin
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A flying game where penguins use rockets to soar through the skies, with simple controls that challenge your piloting skills. Now, let’s dive into the world of penguins, join Peeo on his journey to space, and push your limits to become a true flying legend!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A flying game where penguins use rockets to soar through the skies, with simple controls that challenge your piloting skills. Now, let’s dive into the world of penguins, join Peeo on his journey to space, and push your limits to become a true flying legend!
